channel.title: Duping stuff need help

item.title: Duping stuff need help
item.dc:creator: @pi3ty_hu pi3ty hu
item.description:
@pi3ty_hu wrote:

ok well i thought i fixed most dupes and it turns out i didnt and i need to know how to make it so i cant spawn over 500 of all items at one time

like i can make 1 item do that

	if ((itemID == 7557 && itemAmount >= 0)) {
			        p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "u cant spawn this");
		        p.getActionSender().sendGlobalMessage("l.");
                    p.getActionSender().addSoundEffect(p, 4039, 1, 0, 0);
                    return;
			}

if i do this but i dont want to add like all items to that how do i make it do it to all items anyone know

heres the item code

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("item") && p.jailed == 0) {
			int itemID = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
			int itemAmount = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
			if (p.rights == 2) {
				Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, itemID,itemAmount);
				return;
			}
			int price = (int)Math.round(1.10 * (itemAmount * p.getItemValue(itemID)));
			if (price < 0 || price > 2100000000 || ((int)Math.round(1.10 * (Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]) * p.getItemValue(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])))) > 2100000000)) {
			 p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You do not need to buy this many of this item");
			return;
		}

this is mast3r pkyz source

Read full topic
